## Edit Images
- Update the hamburger icon asset to match the new three-thick-bar rounded green style (hamburger-menu.dim_24x24.svg > hamburger-menu.dim_24x24.svg)

existing_features.title: Update the sidebar header block (top section of LeftSidebar) to include a prominent hamburger menu icon positioned immediately to the left of the brand name “Fourleaf”, matching the uploaded reference layout and keeping consistent padding inside the existing header container.
Implement the hamburger icon visual styling as three thick horizontal bars with rounded ends, using the same vibrant green accent color already used by the Fourleaf logo elements (e.g., #22c55e).

Make the new hamburger icon in the sidebar header act as the toggle to expand/collapse the sidebar navigation menu while preserving the existing dark aesthetic and keeping navigation items (e.g., Home, My Library) in the same order and general layout.

Add a smooth transition animation for the sidebar expand/collapse interaction that is consistent with existing UI motion patterns, and provide appropriate accessibility attributes for the toggle control.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add green rounded-bar hamburger icon left of 'Fourleaf' in sidebar header that toggles sidebar expand/collapse with smooth transition while preserving dark aesthetic and nav layout.

projectName: Add green hamburger icon next to Fourleaf brand in sidebar header with expand/collapse toggle
